ThingDef.label: power arm
ThingDef.description: Unparalleled strength and dexterity, and with retractable claws. This is the ultimate arm upgrade!

ThingDef.label: bionic hand
ThingDef.description: Allows the user to perform tasks even faster than with regular hands.

ThingDef.label: bionic foot
ThingDef.description: This prosthesis grants faster walking without stumbling all the time.

ThingDef.label: bionic ear implant
ThingDef.description: An advanced device that expands upon the basic functions of the ear drum.

ThingDef.label: bionic jaw implant
ThingDef.description: Aside from a strong set of teeth, this also comes with a voice modulator.

ThingDef.label: bionic spine
ThingDef.description: This light and impressing device can replace a damaged spine.

ThingDef.label: bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.

ThingDef.label: bionic arm
ThingDef.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. It gives extreme strength to its user.

ThingDef.label: bionic leg
ThingDef.description: A Bionic Leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.

ThingDef.label: power claw
ThingDef.description: A powerful hand replacement consisting of three deadly claws.

ThingDef.label: scyther blade
ThingDef.description: Hand replacement with a telescoping blade. Scavenged from a dead Scyther Mechanoid. Not very comfortable, but quite effective as a close-range weapon.

ThingDef.label: Bionic ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial ribcage, equipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: brain stimulator
ThingDef.description: A small device that sends electric shocks to the brain to slightly boost consciousness and mobility.
